faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: We answer key questions before you start.

1.q: Do I need to install or download an app?
1.a: No. It runs directly in the browser (web app). Customers just scan the QR and start ordering.

2.a: You can load your base catalog in minutes. From there, manage products, prices and orders from the panel.

3.q: Does it work on any device?
3.a: Yes. It’s optimized for mobile, tablets and modern desktops without special requirements.

4.q: Can I migrate to advanced features later?
4.a: Yes. Start free and enable modules like advanced inventory or deeper reports when you need them.
